characters.name: Cinnamoroll
characters.quote: Let’s fly away and have some sweet adventures!
characters.description: Cinnamoroll is a fluffy white puppy with long ears that help him fly. He is always ready for new adventures and loves anything sweet.

characters.name: Hello Kitty
characters.quote: You can never have too many friends!
characters.description: Hello Kitty is a kind and cheerful little girl who loves to bake cookies and make friends. Her motto is all about spreading happiness and friendship.

characters.name: My Melody
characters.quote: Baking is my favorite way to make friends smile!
characters.description: My Melody is a sweet and gentle rabbit who enjoys baking and sewing. She always puts her friends first and has a heart full of love.

characters.name: Keroppi
characters.quote: Time to hop into action and have some fun!
characters.description: Keroppi is a fun-loving frog who enjoys swimming and singing. He lives with his family in Donut Pond and loves to make his friends laugh.

characters.name: Chococat
characters.description: Chococat is a curious and clever cat known for his sharp wit and his ability to find out about new things before anyone else.

characters.name: Badtz-Maru
characters.quote: I might be grumpy, but I’m always ready for adventure!
characters.description: Badtz-Maru is a mischievous penguin with a rebellious streak. Though he often finds himself in trouble, he’s always up for a new adventure.

characters.name: Kuromi
characters.quote: Being a little mischievous keeps life interesting!
characters.description: Kuromi is a punky tomboy with a sweet tooth and a bit of a mischievous side. Despite her tough exterior, she has a soft spot for romantic stories.

characters.name: Pompompurin
characters.quote: Nothing beats a cozy nap and some delicious pudding.
characters.description: Pompompurin is a laid-back golden retriever who loves nothing more than napping and eating his favorite pudding. He’s friendly, easy-going, and always there to lend a paw.

characters.name: Tuxedo Sam
characters.quote: Oops! I may be clumsy, but I’m always full of fun!
characters.description: Tuxedo Sam is a dapper and friendly penguin who loves to eat and collect bow ties. Although he’s a bit clumsy, he’s always ready to have fun.

characters.name: Gudetama
characters.description: Gudetama is a lazy, egg yolk character who prefers to be left alone. His motto is to do the least amount of work possible.

characters.name: Little Twin Stars
characters.quote: Let’s make every day a magical adventure together!
characters.description: Kiki and Lala, also known as the Little Twin Stars, are a pair of celestial siblings who love to explore the world and spread magic wherever they go.

characters.name: Cogimyun
characters.quote: Every day is a new adventure with friends!
characters.description: Cogimyun is a soft and squishy mushroom character who loves spending time with friends and exploring new places.

characters.name: Gaopoweroo
characters.quote: Feel the roar of the adventure!
characters.description: Gaopoweroo is a friendly lion who brings a powerful presence and a lot of courage to his adventures.

characters.name: Kabukinyantaro
characters.quote: Let’s make every day a performance!
characters.description: Kabukinyantaro is a theatrical cat who loves performing and dressing up in various costumes.

characters.name: Marroncream
characters.quote: Sweet and gentle, just like a creamy dessert!
characters.description: Marroncream is a sweet chestnut character who enjoys baking and being kind to everyone she meets.

characters.name: Charmmy Kitty
characters.quote: Elegance and charm are always in style!
characters.description: Charmmy Kitty is a graceful and elegant kitten who loves fashion and making her friends feel special.

characters.name: Bonbon Ribbon
characters.quote: Sweet and stylish, just like a ribbon!
characters.description: Bonbon Ribbon is a stylish character who loves fashion and always wears a lovely ribbon on her head.
